publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3394 Ross Finnie: Renfrewshire Officially a Fairtrade Zone—That the Parliament congratulates Renfrewshire on officially becoming a Fairtrade Zone; notes that it achieved Fairtrade Zone status in just over one year of campaigning, and further congratulates Renfrewshire on winning the Fairtrade Foundation’s Outstanding Achievement Award at the 2008 Fairtrade Fortnight Awards during its campaign.

S3M-3394 Ross Finnie: Renfrewshire Officially a Fairtrade Zone—That the Parliament congratulates Renfrewshire on officially becoming a Fairtrade Zone; notes that it achieved Fairtrade Zone status in just over one year of campaigning, and further congratulates Renfrewshire on winning the Fairtrade Foundation’s Outstanding Achievement Award at the 2008 Fairtrade Fortnight Awards during its campaign. Supported by: Michael Matheson*, Keith Brown*, Jackie Baillie*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Bill Wilson*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Angela Constance*, Jim Tolson*, Robin Harper*, Patricia Ferguson*
S3M-3394 Renfrewshire Officially a Fairtrade Zone (lodged on 5 February 2009) Ken Macintosh*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Mike Pringle*
S3M-3394 Renfrewshire Officially a Fairtrade Zone (lodged on 5 February 2009) Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-3394 Renfrewshire Officially a Fairtrade Zone (lodged on 5 February 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3394 Renfrewshire Officially a Fairtrade Zone (lodged on 5 February 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3394 Renfrewshire Officially a Fairtrade Zone (lodged on 5 February 2009) Hugh Henry*
S3M-3394 Renfrewshire Officially a Fairtrade Zone (lodged on 5 February 2009) Stuart McMillan*
